item.description:
Live or work near Boston? Join us for our inaugural meeting. Grab some pizza and meet other Sitecore developers and users.

Guest Speakers from Sitecore

  • Joe Henriques â€“ Regional Director
  • Mike Casey - Sitecore Engineer


A few other regional folks from Sitecore will also be on hand to answer questions.

Agenda for Wednesday's Meeting:

6:00-6:30pm - Pizza and Networking
6:30-6:40pm - Welcome and Introductions
6:40-7:00pm - Joe Henriques gives us a look at the Sitecore road map
7:00-7:45pm - Mike Casey will be doing a technical review of Sitecore 6.1's Edit Frames feature
7:45-8:00pm - Open Q&A with the Sitecore team - Bring your questions!
8:00-8:10pm - Planning for the November meeting.
8:10-8:30pm - Networking

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Sign in with security on the 1st floor, the meeting is on the 5th floor training room.
item.name: Inaugural Meeting of the New England Sitecore User Group
